i want to sort the contacts in the group can you make the sorting dynamix the following: default sort by ABC but if i add sorting index then its 1,2, 3 (if i'm not asked then the contacts will be sorted ABC, but sometime i get specific request "put .... at the begining and after that ..."

Calling the api is done through https requests , using the “GET” or “POST” methods. the arguments are passes through the query string(when calling with a “GET” method) or form parameters (using “POST” method). most apis can be called with both “GET” and “POST” methods, but apis that passes must be called with “POST”: namely - userslogin, usersregister and usersupdateDetails .

New user Registration: Registration is done in several steps: User fills basic details (name, email and password) . this is achieved with the usersregister api If the user tries to register with an existing user in the auction house environment an error response code USER_EXIST Bidspirit system send a confirmation email to the user. Until the user confirms his email he cannot proceed with the registration, and the auction house admin will not get notified on the new registration. At this point the user can do 2 things: Resend the confirmation mail - through the usersresendConfirmationMail api Change his email (e.g. in case the user had a type in his email) - through the usersupdateEmail api. A new confirmation mail will be sent to the user. After the user confirms his email he is redirected to a page where he can add more details - phone, address, etc. only after the user completes his details, a request is sent to the auction house admin to approve the user. The details will be saved in bidspirit system through the usersupdateDetails api After the user completes his registration, an email is sent to the auction house admin. The user still cannot place bids until the auction house admin approves the user.

get a catalog item of an auction for a language. Note - it is not recommended to use this api from the client, because the catalog data may be invisible to SEO. The api does not require a session id, so it can be called from the server side.
